group Comptes Utilisateurs

) } export default SuperAdmin function TrainingElement(props) { const tdStyle = 'px-2 py-1 text-[15px] whitespace-nowrap ' return ( props.handleDelete(props.id)} > delete_outline edit mail {props.name} {props.tel} {props.password} {props.status} {props.date} {props.email} ) }
